code.displayName: Relevant diagnostic tests and/or laboratory data

td.content: s:white F aged 51 years presents with moderate decreased hearing in the affected ear, moderate pain and discharge in ear x 6 weeks. patient also reports chronic moderate difficulty hearing words during conversation especially in noisy environments. she denies ever using cigarettes denies any alcohol use o:Height 167 cm, Weight 70.8 kg, Temperature 37.2 C, Pulse 79, SystolicBP 110, DiastolicBP 71, Respiration 17 a:Hearing Loss p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and referred patient to otorhinolaryngology.

td.content: s:patient reports moderate decreased hearing in the affected ear, moderate pain and discharge in ear. Also complains of moderate difficulty hearing words during conversation especially in noisy environments from time to time. she is a white F aged 51 years. o:Height 166 cm, Weight 69.3 kg, Temperature 37.1 C, Pulse 78, SystolicBP 105, DiastolicBP 65, Respiration 16 a:Hearing Loss p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed prednisone - 60 mg daily, and ordered Myringotomy - ear.

td.content: s:pt presents with moderate difficulty hearing words during conversation especially in noisy environments, moderate pain and discharge in ear and moderate decreased hearing in the affected ear for 7 weeks. she has a history of Hearing Loss for past 3 years. pt is a 52 yo white f treasurer. o:Height 167 cm, Weight 72.3 kg, Temperature 37 C, Pulse 81, SystolicBP 113, DiastolicBP 76, Respiration 17 a:Hearing Loss p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and ordered pure tone audiometry.
